    • Constructor Detail

      • SimulationGrid

        public SimulationGrid(E[][] array,
                      java.lang.Class<E> type,
                      CellState baseState)
        Create a grid from a 2 dimensional array of cells. All null values in grid will be initialized to a default Class and default State
        Parameters:
        array - 2 dimensional array of cells
        type - default type of cell to populate grid
        baseState - default state to populate grid

    • Method Detail

      • getNeighbors

        public SimulationGrid<E> getNeighbors(int x,
                                      int y)
        Returns up to 8 neighbors of the cell at x,y in a 3 by 3 grid; the center of the cell is null
        Parameters:
        x - x-index of cell to get neighbors of
        y - y-index of cell to get neighbors of
        Returns:
        3 by 3 Grid
